root.name: Barbie Pet Rescue
root.description: Overview Pet missing? Don’t worry because in this game Barbie travels on her scooter to three different places to find eight different lost pets. You are joined by your kid sister Stacey in the Vet’s office. There you get missions to save the cuddly friends. You can also care for and tend to the animals. Some animals are hurt. You must mend them back to health. Enjoy the lush Barbie worlds and realistic animals.
